import requests


def send_result(result_json_string: str):
    with requests.Session() as session:
        # get information from Configuration and Connection
        conn = api.config.ODataConnection["connectionProperties"]
        full_url = conn["url"] + api.config.path
        user = conn["user"]
        password = conn["password"]
        
        # Fetch CSRF-Token
        token_request = session.get(full_url,
                                     headers={"X-CSRF-Token": "fetch", "Accept": "application/json"},
                                     auth=(user, password))
        
        
        # Post request with CSRF-Token
        result_send_post = session.post(full_url, result_json_string,
                                         headers={"x-csrf-token": token_request.headers["x-csrf-token"],
                                                  "Content-Type": "application/json",
                                                  "OData-Version": "4.0"
                                         }, 
                                         auth=(user, password))
        api.send("response", f"Status Code: {result_send_post.status_code}")
        api.send("response", str(result_send_post.json()))

    
api.set_port_callback('result', send_result)
